senselogic.sitevision.api.metadata.builder

Interface RelatedValueBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Builder<RelatedValue>

    @Requireable(value="RelatedValueBuilder")
public interface RelatedValueBuilder
extends Builder<RelatedValue>
    Builder to create RelatedValue instances that can be used to set related metadata.

    RelatedValueBuilder has one mandatory attribute:

    • values - The related values. Must be non-empty.

    Using the RelatedValueBuilder is pretty straightforward, if you remember that it is stateful. Conceptually you would typically use it like this:

    1. Get the RelatedValueBuilder
    2. Add a value
    3. Possibly add more values
    4. Do build

    When you have built a RelatedValue instance, you can re-use the RelatedValueBuilder to build more instances. Something like:

    1. Clear values
    2. Add a value
    3. Possibly add more values
    4. Do build

    Tip! The Builder interface documentation contains more information about Builders and how to work with them!

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via MetadataUtil.getRelatedValueBuilder(). See MetadataUtil for how to obtain an instance of the MetadataUtil interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 3.6
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren

      • addUser

        RelatedValueBuilder addUser(Node aUserNode)
                     throws IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a user value.
        Parameters:
        aUserNode - the user node to add (a node with primary node type sv:user or sv:simpleUser)
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if aUserNode is null or an invalid user node (e.g. sv:systemUser - Anonymous, System, Indexer, Validator or Extractor)

      • addText

        RelatedValueBuilder addText(String aText)
        Adds a text value.
        Parameters:
        aText - the text to add. A null or whitespace-only value will be completely ignored.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • clearValues

        RelatedValueBuilder clearValues()
        Removes all currently added values.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • build

        RelatedValue build()
            throws IllegalStateException
        Creates a RelatedValue instance using current state of this builder.
        Specified by:
        build in interface Builder<RelatedValue>
        Returns:
        a related value
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the builder contains no values.
